name: help-me-faast
description: An Electron-based Linux application designed to break the "autopilot eating" loop during prolonged fasting

scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:electron && concurrently "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:electron && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.electron:build:appimage: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:electron && electron-builder --linux AppImage --publish never
scripts.electron:build:deb: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:electron && electron-builder --linux deb --publish never
scripts.electron:build:rpm: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:electron && electron-builder --linux rpm --publish never
scripts.electron:build:pacman: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:electron && electron-builder --linux pacman --publish never

author: Sidnei

linux.description: A desktop application to help you stay focused during extended fasting. Features a metabolic wheel, electrolyte tips, progress tracking, and neuroscience-based hunger management.
